name: The Investigator (Wojon)
description:
The Investigator is a puzzle based stealth horror game where you, the investigator tries to solve the disappearance of 18 year old Eleanor. You have to solve puzzles to progress through Von Bergen's mansion and whatever you do, don't anger IT...

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • E: Interact/Pickup
  • I: Inventory
  • F: enable/disable flashlight
  • C: crouch
  • Mouse: look around
